item.title: Maja add a quote by William Shakespeare
Maja add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Maja add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "My tastes are simple: I am easily satisfied with the best." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Maja add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "In War: Resolution, In Defeat: Defiance, In Victory: Magnaminity In Peace: Good Will." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Maja add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Certain motherfuckers think they can fuck with my shit, but you can't kill the Rooster. You might can fuck him up some times, but, bitch, nobody kills the motherfucking Rooster. You know what I'm saying?" -- David Sedaris

item.title: Maja add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "If you cannot read all your books...fondle them---peer into them, let them fall open where they will, read from the first sentence that arrests the eye, set them back on the shelves with your own hands, arrange them on your own plan so that you at least know where they are. Let them be your friends; let them, at any rate, be your acquaintances." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Maja add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "No folly is more costly than the folly of intolerant idealism." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Maja add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
Maja add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I did not attend his funeral, but I sent a nice letter saying I approved of it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Maja add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I've had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this wasn't it." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Maja add a quote by Oscar Wilde (attributed to)
item.description: "Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go." -- Oscar Wilde (attributed to)

item.title: Maja add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Maja add a quote by F.E. Smith, Lord Birkenhead
Maja add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description:
"He has all the virtues I dislike and none of the vices I admire."
<a href="http://www.winston-churchill-leadership.com/churchill-quote-others.html">[On British Labour politician Stafford Cripps.]</a>" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Maja add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "His mother should have thrown him away and kept the stork." -- Mae West

item.title: Maja add a quote by Billy Wilder
item.description: "He has Van Gogh’s ear for music." -- Billy Wilder

item.title: Maja add a quote by Stephen Bishop
item.description: "I feel so miserable without you; it’s almost like having you here." -- Stephen Bishop
